property.name: autoNavigate
property.label: Auto Navigate
property.description: When marked as true flow will automatically navigate to next screen/element after successful scan

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: Label for button that launches scanner

property.name: buttonIcon
property.label: Button Icon
property.description: Icon for the scanner button i.e. utility:cases

property.name: scannerInstructions
property.label: Scanner Instructions
property.default: Click Scan Barcode to open a barcode scanner camera view. Position a barcode in the scanner view to scan it.
property.description: Instructions for user on how to use barcode scanner displayed on the component

property.name: scanContinuously
property.label: Continous Scan
property.description: When set at true allows for multiple barcodes to be scanned in one session results are stored in a string collection scannedBarcodes
